name: CCKO2022
description:
================  NOTICE  ================

If downloaded before 13th May, Redownload to fix a bug with private matches.

  • New Download 'CCKO_V2' - fixed bug where private matches were left open to random people joining.
=========================================== Fan Game: Creator Clash Knockout 2022

Make sure to download with a friend! because right now there most likely won't be anyone playing online in your region for quick-matchmaking.

A small and free multiplayer fan game inspired by the creator clash event - with strong themes of janky-ness and made in a very short time. 

Pick your favourite creator to fight your least favourite creator.

Online matchmaking in your region, or download with a friend for a private match.

Multiplayer max concurrent players: 20

preliminary, possible latency issues between regions restricted. Donations needed to help increase max concurrent players. 

  • No single player
  •  Online matchmaking
  • Private matches

to make a private match, enter any unique name or code into the input field and click private match, Your friend can join by putting the same code in the input field and pressing private match.

Leader boards

Leader boards show total win/lose of each creator, not individual players. Ranks aren't real time - they update daily.  May be unavailable at times  (More Jank).

Disclaimer

Please don't sue me Idubbbz.

event link: https://thecreatorclash.com

Notes
  • Player damages increased
  • There are many bugs, just enjoy them
